description: The work includes constructing a dredge material containment cell at the Lingan Cape Breton Co.
tags: Infrastructure building and surfacing and paving services
full_summary:
____________________
# Tenders for Dredge Containment Site Project
#### Issued by: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4313883438
**Publication Date:** November 17, 2023
**Closing Date:** December 18, 2023 2:00 PM

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued for a dredge containment site project located at Lingan, Cape Breton County, Nova Scotia (NS). The project involves the construction of an infrastructure building and surfacing facility, as well as marine construction services and land preparation. 

**Project Details:**

* Location: Lingan, Cape Breton County, NS
* Contract Type: Competitive Bidding
* SCOPE OF WORK:
    + Construction of a dredge material containment cell at the designated disposal site
    + Infrastructure building and surfacing services,including marine construction
    + Land preparation and surfacing services
* Contract Period: Not specified

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Contractors are required to meet the qualification requirements for the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the specified format
* Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price offered

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Richard Parsons 
* Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18041561?extsite=MTgwNDE1NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18041561?extsite=MTgwNDE1NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Detailed Requirements:**

All bidders are required to submit their proposals in accordance with the RFP. Technical questions and contractual questions must be addressed to the Contracting Authority as per the RFP guidelines.

____________________
